title: Interest-Based Creative Learning Design: Social Innovation Projects for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Practical experience in social sector domains and possession of basic professional expertise
context.additional_context: A course where professionals solve social issues encountered in daily work through creative approaches, designed to enable production activities using only smartphones and simple digital tools

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more creative ideas for solving social problems based on their personal areas of interest.
Learners can produce concrete outputs at least twice by utilizing a three-stage creative process: imitating, combining, and staging.
Learners can develop the habit of improving outputs by incorporating peer feedback and establish a plan to apply this in daily life.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
